p: The MODIS Deep Blue aerosol products were acquired from the Level-1 and Atmosphere Archive and Distribution System (LAADS) Distributed Active Archive Center (DAAC), located in the Goddard Space Flight Center in Greenbelt, Maryland ( https://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/). PRECL precipitation data are download from: http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/, while TRMM precipitation data are available from: http://disc.sci.gsfc.nasa.gov/gesNews/trmm_v7_multisat_precip. AVHRR leaf area index data are available at: ftp://eclipse.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/cdr/lai-fapar/files/.
